news.title: Threads is testing a shortcut to quickly start DM conversations
news.summary: Users who are part of the test can type "DM me" or "Message me" in a post or reply to automatically generate a hyperlink that invites others to start a private conversation with them.

news.title: Read AI launches an email-based ‘digital twin’ to help you with schedules and answers
news.summary: Read AI is launching Ada, which can reply with your availability and extract answers from the company knowledge base and the web.

news.title: Bumble adds AI-powered photo feedback and profile guidance tools
news.summary: Bumble and other popular dating apps, like Match Group's Tinder and Hinge, have all embraced AI-powered features.

news.title: Walmart agrees to $100M settlement over deceptive pay practices in Spark Driver program
news.summary: The suit said Walmart would mislead drivers about their possible tips and would reduce their base pay, among other things.

news.title: Self-driving truck startup Einride raises $113M PIPE ahead of public debut
news.summary: The proceeds will support Einride’s technology roadmap, global expansion, and autonomous deployments in North America, Europe, and the Middle East.

news.title: Razer’s new laptop sleeve wirelessly charges other devices
news.summary: Razer has announced an expensive new laptop sleeve that's not made from an exotic animal or encrusted in diamonds. news.title: Cricut’s most popular cutting machine now takes up less space in your crafting room
news.summary: Cricut has announced new versions of two of its cutting machines that could appeal to crafters struggling with limited space for their hobby. news.title: Ford is recalling 4.3 million trucks and SUVs to fix a towing software bug
news.summary: An OTA update will be pushed out in a few weeks; owners can also go to a dealership.

news.title: New AirSnitch attack breaks Wi-Fi encryption in homes, offices, and enterprises
news.summary: That guest network you set up for your neighbors may not be as secure as you think.

news.title: New York sues Valve for enabling "illegal gambling" with loot boxes
news.summary: The ability to resell Steam items for real value is key to the state's case.

news.title: A non-public document reveals that science may not be prioritized on next Mars mission
news.summary: For some reason, NASA chose not to publicly release its Mars orbiter objectives.

news.title: 15 state attorneys general sue RFK Jr. over "anti-science" vaccine policy
news.summary: Trump administration’s reduced vaccine schedule “throws science out the window.”

news.title: OpenAI Announces Major Expansion of London Office
news.summary: The San Francisco-based AI lab is growing its research team in London. The move puts it in direct competition with Google DeepMind for top research talent in the UK.

news.title: Best Tested Ski Clothes (2026): Shells, Jackets, Wool Socks
news.summary: From weatherproof jackets and pants to puffers, gloves, and socks, WIRED’s winter sports experts have got you covered.

news.title: Who’s Your Daddy? A Chatbot
news.summary: More people are turning to AI to explore their BDSM fantasies, but some in the community feel it’s a cop-out.

news.title: The Best Headphones I’ve Tried (and Why I'd Buy Them All)
news.summary: The portable listening revolution is fully underway. From open earbuds to noise cancelers and wired headphones, I can find a reason to love them all.

news.title: Why Sierra the Supercomputer Had to Die
news.summary: For seven years, she ran high-security nuclear simulations for the US government. Now, this famous supercomputer is being put to death.
